body.name: D&H FURNIMMT 18 Inch King Bed Frame Support Up to 3000lbs - Easy Assemble/Non-Slip/Noise Free/No Box Spring Needed/Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bedframe, Black
features: 【Sturdiness】The king bedframe with durable structure,noise-free design, provide peaceful sleep.
【Storage Capacity】20.18" tall king metal bed frame have 16.5" of ample under bed storage.
【Easy Installation】The minimalist style king size bed frame platform with Assembly instructions and tools inside, easy to assemble.
【No Box Spring Required】This metal king bed frame designed replace your box spring, save space and reduce the cost.
【Anti-Slip Mattress】Right size mattress sleep inside the king platform bed frame, Non slip!
【Protect Toes】Each middle legs fitted with black sponge, won't hurt even you kick it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is awesome! It's taller than most which is perfect for storing anything underneath. Great space saver!! It is a bit difficult to put together, it's definitely easier with 2 people, at least for getting the 2 ends together because you have to hold several pieces in perfect alignment while you screw them together. Still, managed to do almost all of it on my own, but some pieces were crooked so I asked for help just with holding them while I screwed them together to straighten it up. It's very quiet, no squeaks whatsoever! Definitely a high quality bed frame and well made. Highly recommend if you're looking for a space saving design and you like to keep it simple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, tall platform bed.
reviews.reviewText: Nice and tall for great storage. Very sturdy as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Storage but Super High
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting the frame to be so tall when I ordered it, but it worked out well. I was hoping to get a lot of storage under the bed, and this frame delivered on that, for sure. However, with the height of our mattress, it feels a bit like a dorm bed. But overall, the amount of added storage space is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for storage in small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I'm staying in the guest bedroom at my moms while custom renovating my camper to move in and travel full time. This was the perfect solution for me to tuck some of my items away without encroaching on their garage or other spaces. Now I can keep things nice and tidy. I was kinda shocked initially how high up this made the bed especially with a pillowtop mattress. It was super easy to assemble, very lightweight and now I can slide full size storage totes under it no problem! Great thing for dorm rooms too! Very cool I'll post a picture of it once I install the headboard onto frame properly.One observation so far is the the corners are almost perfectly knee high and for safety reasons I really think they need to include something to protect people from banging their knees on them. Rounded padding maybe? As a fabricator by trade for a few years and handy woman I'll be figuring out a way to create my own devices to install on them and will return with my solution just in case the company or others are interested in what I come up with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: We used this to replace the bedframe in our room after our one from a big box store finally went kaput after 13 years of kids jumping on it and family movie nights. So far so good! Feels MUCH sturdier and I love not hearing terrifying creaking every time I move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life changing bed frame?
reviews.reviewText: Can a bed frame change your life?! Yes, yes it can. When you had negative storage space and suddenly have an entire extra large closet’s worth of storage space, it’s pretty drastic.I started with one, and have since assembled one of these frames for each family member and this was the last one. Assembly was simple as expected, but I remember they even my first assembly, (which was a king size!) wasn’t difficult, it just took a little longer. The frames are so sturdy not even the first one is wobbly after many years. No boxspring needed unless you want to use a step-stool to climb into bed, or get a running start across the room.Super sturdy. I can’t imagine ever going back to our old bed frames with 4-6 inches of space underneath.You can slide several large storage drawers underneath with room to spare on top.I could rave about these for awhile.Suffice to say these bed frames are pretty great. Most definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy build, lots of storage space, OK sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, instructions are clear, but make no mistake, this is still a "cheap" basic bed frame. Lower quality than the Ikea bed it replaced, and will definitely need padded feet so it doesn't destroy our real hardwood floors.Feels a little wobbly once the mattress is on it, but an "expected level of wobble" considering that its made out of thin'ish stamped metal. Mattress-to-frame fit is also acceptable but not perfect. The memory foam mattress we've got on it (also from Amazon) leaves a couple inches of space where the frame is bigger than the mattress on all sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made! Highly recommended
reviews.reviewText: Pros: - This metal bedframe is solid and well built. - It is made of high quality material. - It is easy to install. - There's a lot of space under the frame.Cons: - None
